abstract: Prosecution in murder trial of murder suspect Oral Nicholas Hillary admits it failed to provide defense with statement from witness placing John Jones, sheriff deputy in St Lawrence County, NY, at scene of crime; Jones was at one time considered suspect in death of 12-year-old Garrett Phillips; revelation results in near mistrial.
lead_paragraph: Oral Nicholas Hillary was denied a mistrial over a prosecutor’s failure to disclose that a witness saw a different man in the building where Garrett Phillips was killed.
snippet: Oral Nicholas Hillary was denied a mistrial over a prosecutor’s failure to disclose that a witness saw a different man in the building where Garrett Phillips was killed....

headline.main: Prosecution in Potsdam Murder Case Admits a Lapse
headline.print_headline: Prosecution in Upstate Murder Case Admits a Lapse
